Copy Saver: Your Digital Clipboard Organizer
Copy Saver is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing and research experience. It automatically saves text you copy from any website, allowing you to easily revisit and manage your collected information.
Key Features:

1. Automatic Saving: Copy Saver captures any text you copy while browsing, saving it along with the source URL.
2. Organized List: View all your copied items in a clean, easy-to-read list within the extension popup.
3. Search Functionality: Quickly find specific copied text using the built-in search feature.
4. Source URL: Each copied item includes a link to its original webpage, making it easy to revisit your sources.
5. Export Option: Export all your saved items to a text file, perfect for creating backups or sharing your research.
6. Individual Item Management: Clear specific items you no longer need with a single click.
7. Clear All: Easily remove all saved items when you're done with a project or want to start fresh.
8. Auto-Cleanup: The extension automatically removes items older than 10 days to keep your list manageable.
9. Privacy-Focused: All data is stored locally on your device, ensuring your copied content remains private.
10. Lightweight and Fast: Designed to work seamlessly without slowing down your browsing experience.

Perfect for:

Students collecting research from multiple sources
Professionals gathering information across various websites
Writers compiling ideas and quotes
Anyone who frequently copies and refers back to online content

Copy Saver streamlines your workflow by eliminating the need to switch between multiple documents or tabs to retrieve copied text. It's your personal digital clipboard, always ready to help you organize and access the information you need.
Start saving time and staying organized with Copy Saver today!
Note: Copy Saver respects your privacy and does not collect or transmit any personal data or copied content.
